name: ZLinky_TIC Router v1.0
body:
## Initial version (v1.0)

* mode historique - (mono / triphasé) : abonnement BASE, HC.., EJP., BBRx
* mode standard - (mono / tripasé / production) : BASE, HCHP
* sélection du mode automatique 
* LED clignotant --> Erreurs / pas de décodage du Linky
* LED fixe --> réception et décodage Linky OK
* 20 Config report possibles 
* fonction routeur
* mise à jour OTA

### Clusters disponibles

  EndPoint: 0x01
  Profile ID: 0x0104 (ZigBee HA)
  Device ID: 0x0053 (Unknown)
  Input Cluster Count: 6
    Cluster 0:  Cluster ID: 0x0000 (General: Basic)
    Cluster 1:  Cluster ID: 0x0003 (General: Identify)
    Cluster 2:  Cluster ID: 0x0702 (Smart Energy: Metering)
    Cluster 3:  Cluster ID: 0x0B04 (Unknown)
    Cluster 4:  Cluster ID: 0x0B01 (Unknown)
    Cluster 5:  Cluster ID: 0xFF66 (Unknown)
  Output Cluster Count: 1
    Cluster 0:  Cluster ID: 0x0019 (General: OTA)

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v3.0
body:
## Changelog

* Fix data type for 0x702 cluster attribut consumption. uint32 to uint48 (For ZiGate v3.21)
* Fix config report bug on cluster 0x702
* Fix PIN Led error
* Fix differents data type value (DATE, HHPHC, VTIC, PREF)
* Fix version size 0x0000 | 0x4000

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v4.0
body:
## Version 0004

* Add LinkyMode property (cluster 0xFF66 / property : 0x0300)
* Add Alarm reportable function
* Add Alarm when STGE was updated
* Fix reportable value (UMOY1, UMOY2, UMOY2, SMAXN, STGE)
* Fix ADPS value (RAZ when no appear)

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v5.0
body:
### Version 0005

* Add bindtable in debug view
* Add compatibility with new hardware
* Fix ADPS RAZ bug

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v6.0 (EXPERIMENTAL)
body:
**!!! Do not use for your production mode !!!**

### Version 0006

* Add Route limitation to 1. (Save energy)
* Add fragmented packet capacity
* Increase size of config report table (max 50)
* Increase PDU size
* Fix data type (0x42) and length (max 72 for the moment) of Standard PJOUR+1 and PPOINTE

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fairecasoimeme/Zlinky_TIC/compare/v5.0...v6.0

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v7.0
body:
### Version 0007

* Add Linky acquisition timer parameter.(Readable/Writable and in PDM memory) Cluster : 0xff66 - attribut : 0x0100 (par defaut : 0x0A)
* Add Blinking LED (fast) for permit join mode
* Add 2 config files. With or without childs routing function (ZLinky_router_v7.0_no_route.ota for no childs routing function)
* Fix blocking timer when Linky Acquisition.
* Fix Reportable Attribut. SMAXN2 Cluster : 0x0b04 - attribut : 0x090D / SMAXN3 Cluster : 0x0b04 - attribut : 0x0A0D

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v8.0
body:
### Version 0008

* Fix inconsistent app.zpscfg for router mode. https://github.com/fairecasoimeme/Zlinky_TIC/issues/99

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v9.0
body:
### Version 0009

* Fix Manufacturer specific issue. To fix the manufacturer Specific request error, The check of the flag has been deactivated. This method has been chosen to give compatibility with all plugins.  

Reminder : Manufacturer id is : 0x1037 (4151)

https://github.com/zigpy/zha-device-handlers/pull/1165

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v10.0
body:
### Version 0010

* Update LED management to reduce consumption when all is ok (LED ON)
* Add new cluster/ attr SINSTS, SMAXN and SMAXN-1 because these values are unique in "mode triphasé" https://github.com/fairecasoimeme/Zlinky_TIC/issues/112
   * SINSTS : cluster : 0x0b04 attr : 0x0306
   * SMAXS : cluster : 0x0b04 attr : 0x0304
   * SMAXN-1 : cluster : 0xff66 attr : 0x0400
* Update MCUXpresso config files and Makefile to manage limited and legacy firmware
* Update OTA time wait. Verify update OTA between 2 hours and 4 hours instead of 2m-4m
* Rename the limited version configuration file



⚠️Warning : 
* If you are already in legacy version, you can use the OTA file
* If you are with "no_router" version, you have to flash your device with usb module. (And you will use OTA file for futures versions)

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v11.0
body:
### Version 0011

* Add SINST SMAXN SMAXN-1 "monophasé" compatibility to all plugins

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v12.0
body:
### Version 0012
* Add voltage driver
* Add main voltage infos  
Cluster 0x0001 (Power Configuration) :
  - Attribut 0x0000 (mains voltage)
  - Attribut 0x0011 (mains voltage min threshold)
  - Attribut 0x0012 (mains voltage max threshold)
* Add more zigbee radio reactivity - Now you can send and receive zigbee requests during Linky acquisition

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v13.0
body:
### Version 0013
* Add MOTDETAT value (from historic mode) --> Cluster : 0xFF66 - Attribut : 0x0009
* Add null value for all of default metering properties
* Add watchdog reset process when hardfault error
* Fix duplicate voltage acquisition
* Fix operator error for comparison

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v14.0
body:
### Version 0014
* Add Tuya zigbee compatibility (see datas management [here](#tuya-from-v14))
* Add ENEDIS Labellisation software "Linky Ready"
  - Better data consistency
  - Better error management
  - Change LED blinking
  - Change UART decoding

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v15.0
body: ### Version 0015 * Add Silvercrest / Livarno compatibility with Tuya (change the device id to Dimming ligth) * Add tariffPeriod (0x10) attribute with Lixee cluster (0xff66). - Add alarm (reporting) on value update * Decreasing MAX Report interval to 20 seconds (in aim to enhance reporting time) * Fix Total apparent power for Tuya * Enhance netwrok management ⚠️ **Attention** **La mise à jour peut nécessiter une remise à zéro de l'appareil. Si après la mise à jour, le ZLinky n'a plus la Led allumée, il faut suivre la procédure de remise à zéro**

name: ZLinky_TIC Router v16.0
body:
### Version 0016

* Fix dataType for SINSTS ERQ1 and SMAXN for the reporting
* Fix acquisition after update
* Fix bugs
* Delete some debug to free UART

⚠️ Attention sur Z2M, après chaque nouveau appairage, il faut relancer la reconfiguration ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/3dc7b32b-95bf-4c30-909b-b9260f718fc6) plusieurs fois pour que tous les rapports soient pris en compte

⚠️ le problème de tariffPeriod en erreur dans Z2M n'est pas lié au firmware mais au plugin (qui est en cours de résolution)
